Module Stratego
Package com.stratego

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
com.stratego.Piece
public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Piece classes contain information concerning a game piece's rank, unique ID, and owner Player.
Author:
Rebecca Whisnant, Clint Mooney

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static int currentId
    Contains the next number to be assigned when getNewId is called.
    (package private) int id
    Provides a unique identifier for a piece.
    (package private) int owner
    Represents which player owns the piece.
    (package private) java.lang.String rank
    Identifies which type of piece the Piece object represents.
    static java.lang.String[] ranks
    Contains the ranks of different pieces sorted by value.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Piece​(int owner, java.lang.String rank)
    Creates a Piece object and assigns owner and rank to their corresponding attributes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getId()
    Returns id.
    private static int getNewId()
    Returns a unique identifying number to be assigned to a Piece instance.
    int getOwner()
    Returns owner.
    java.lang.String getRank()
    Returns rank.
    int getRankValue()
    Returns the index of rank in ranks.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
